name: Links and emails
content:
Find URLs and emails, and handle some edge cases.
By @DaveNotik, http://woven.co.

Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk <--- allow for dots in emails.
www.demo.com <--- handle www too.	http://foo.co.uk/
demo.com <-- don't link this (pretty standard), though debatable.
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
@awesome <-- don't link this. and this is@rad-socool <--- not a valid email.
qefwefjwef @jsjsjs ssjsdjdjd @182-29383s.jdjdjd
aksksks @s sjsjs dndjsjd @hshd hahshdshshdhsjadhsjahshdjashssjsahsjshs.
s@tom.c <-- TLDs must have two chars minimum.
ksks@jsjs.com

http://wwjwjw.com 

https://kwkwkw.com 

jsjs:ksksk <-- don't treat this as a URL.

http://test.fizz.com.foo.bar.buzz.0--------
